p: 4 g of microcapsules were placed in a breaker and added 40 ml hexane. The sample was kept a vortex movement for 1 min using a vortex apparatus (SBS100‐2, Select BioProducts). The solvent mixture was filtered into an evaporating dish. Triplicate determinations were performed. All solvents were collected and evaporated. The surface oil content was weighted.
